name: countrycoderm
description: CountryCodeRM is a versatile npm package that allows users to retrieve country names from country codes and vice versa. Whether you're looking to convert India -> +91 or +91 -> India, this package provides a simple and efficient way to handle country code lookups in your applications. With support for numerous countries, it streamlines global communication and helps manage country data effortlessly
author: imrushikesh77
